documentation.xhtml: The starting signal of the route can be opened to go through this route
Signal is opened for CBTC trains (downstream block occupation is ignored)

body.FBD:
[[[toReplace:for each route]]] [[[toReplace:input__RouteFormationDemand]]] [[[toReplace:input__IncompRouteFormationDemand]]] [[[toReplace:input__IncompRouteState]]] [[[toReplace:input__RouteDestructDemand]]] [[[toReplace:input__TransitTcOccupation]]] [[[toReplace:input__TransitTcIgnoreOccupation]]] [[[toReplace:input__ApproachTcOccupation]]] [[[toReplace:input__OriginSignalOpen]]] [[[toReplace:param__DelayDestruct]]] [[[toReplace:input__IgnoreApproach]]]
[[[toReplace:blockOr__IncompRouteFormationDemand]]] [[[toReplace:blockOr__IncompRouteState]]] [[[toReplace:for each transit TC]]] [[[toReplace:blockOr__TcNotOccupationIgnore]]] [[[toReplace:blockAnd__TransitTcOccupation]]] [[[toReplace:blockOr__ApproachTcOccupation]]]
[[[toReplace:block__Approach]]] [[[toReplace:block__RouteState]]]
[[[toReplace:output_RouteState]]]
[[[toReplace:for each switch/pair of switches]]] [[[toReplace:input__RouteState]]] [[[toReplace:input__SwitchTcOccupation]]] [[[toReplace:input__SwitchTcIgnoreOccupation]]] [[[toReplace:input__SwitchManualOverride]]]
[[[toReplace:blockOr__RouteState]]] [[[toReplace:for each switch TC]]] [[[toReplace:blockOr__SwitchNotOccupationIgnore]]] [[[toReplace:blockAnd__SwitchTcOccupation]]] [[[toReplace:blockNot__SwitchManualOverride]]] [[[toReplace:blockOr__SwitchManualOverride]]]
[[[toReplace:blockAnd__SwitchCommandConditions]]]
[[[toReplace:output_SwitchCommands]]]
[[[toReplace:for each route]]] [[[toReplace:input__RouteState]]] [[[toReplace:input__RouteDestructDemand]]] [[[toReplace:input__SwitchPosition]]] [[[toReplace:input__SwitchManualOverride]]] [[[toReplace:input__SignalCloseCommand]]]
[[[toReplace:blockNot__RouteDestructDemand]]] [[[toReplace:blockAnd__SwitchPosition]]] [[[toReplace:blockNot__SwitchManualOverride]]] [[[toReplace:blockOr__SwitchManualOverride]]] [[[toReplace:blockNot__SignalCloseCommand]]]
[[[toReplace:blockAnd__SignalCommandConditions]]]
[[[toReplace:output_RouteSignalOpen]]]

documentation.xhtml: Allows a switch to be moved on site /!\ safety critical /!\
Force a signal to be closed
Allow to destruct a route even if this TC is occupied. /!\ safety critical /!\
Allow to destruct a route even if there is a risk of a train entering. /!\ safety critical /!\
